title: Cant install LOL on my mac, tried everything.
body:
well, its a new laptop running OSX El Capitan, downloaded the dmg file off the LOL website, opened it and dragged the LOL icon to applications as i would do with any other app.

manually navigated through applications and opened the LOL launcher, it seems to download something off the internet as it increases its size to 204.7MB, then nothing happens.

i run the launcher again and it shows the LOL logo for a split second then dissapears.

tried everything from downloading different servers (NA, EU, AUS) to switching the userkernel file to changing the DNS. it just wont work. deleting everything and reinstalling, reinstalling in different folder... everything.

contact support but they havent replied and its been almost 2 days.. 

any advice??

replies.body: It sounds like something might be blocking you from installing the game.  I'm glad to hear that you've submitted a ticket!  We may be able to take a deeper look and get this resolved for good through your ticket.  Thanks for your patience!

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Let us know if these permissions haven't gotten League to run. 


http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
